Title: Authorizes a program for electronic filing for commencement of civil actions and proceedings and service of papers in town and village courts
Summary: Authorizes the chief administrator of the courts to promulgate rules authorizing an electronic filing program for commencement of civil actions and proceedings and filing and service of papers in town and village courts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to authorizing a program for electronic filing for commencement of civil actions and proceedings and service of papers in town and village courts
